_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Bad character [an4.209:5.3]: Uses speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical
Worse character [an4.209:5.3]: Uses speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical
Encourages others to do these things
Good character [an4.209:5.3]: Doesn’t use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical
Better character [an4.209:5.3]: Doesn’t use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical
Encourages others to do these things
